core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Prepare request and invoke DoVoid service. Used after an authroisation has been obtained. Same outcomes are possible as DoCapture etc.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: No authorisation step for Refund Transaction

core:outcomeLink.core:condition: state.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '579063' || state.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '580034' || state.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '580036' || state.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '589009' || state.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '580035' || state.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '529010' || state.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '579065' || state.payPalTenderItem.error.errorId == '580033'

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Invoke DoVoid service after timeout in case the request was successfully processed. If void fails with Already Processed error, must warn the operator.
